mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(kakao_profile_url, kakao_email, member_name, member_position, member_intro) values (#{kakaoProfileUrl}, #{kakaoEmail}, #{memberName}, #{memberPosition}, #{memberIntro})
mapper.select: select id, created_date, updated_date, kakao_profile_url, kakao_email, member_name, member_position, member_intro, status from tbl_member where kakao_email=#{kakaoEmail}
select mk.id, member_id, skill_id, skill_name from tbl_member m join tbl_member_skill mk on m.id = mk.member_id join tbl_skill s on mk.skill_id = s.id where m.kakao_email = #{kakaoEmail}
